abstract: A Chinese-language newspaper has published messages from Hong Kong lawmakers that call into question the head of the Legislative Council’s neutrality and hint at the chaos and miscues during an important vote.

headline.main: Leaked Messages Reveal Behind-the-Scenes Maneuvers During Hong Kong Election Vote

snippet: A Chinese-language newspaper has published messages from Hong Kong lawmakers that call into question the head of the Legislative Council’s neutrality and hint at the chaos and miscues during an important vote.
